name: Klonoa: Project Moonlight
storyline:
After traveling for a long time, Klonoa finds himself in yet another dream world that needs his help, only to encounter an empty town. Strangely, the only other person in the town is someone he recognizes...

Making his return from Klonoa: Dream Champ Tournament, the freelance hunter Guntz finds himself in the same dream world! He claims he's looking for someone, but something doesn't add up about his sudden return...
